tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Somebody That I Used to Know - Walk off the Earth (Gotye - Cover)
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis:
iTunes Download: http://bit.ly/xe65hD WOTE and Beard Guy shirts and undies!!! - click here: http://bit.ly/xZolh7
WOTE SUMMER TOUR! TICKET LINKS:
August 25 -- Berlin, DE http://goo.gl/2v0rC (SOLD OUT!) August 26 -- Wiesbaden, DE http://goo.gl/kaAm7 (SOLD OUT!) August 27 -- Cologne, DE http://goo.gl/93hFo (SOLD OUT!) August 29 -- Munchen, DE http://goo.gl/PcvSd (SOLD OUT!) August 30 -- Vienna, AT http://goo.gl/U3adF (SOLD OUT!) August 31 -- Nuremberg, DE http://goo.gl/9Jwei (SOLD OUT!) September 01 -- Bochum, DE http://goo.gl/dKsUf (SOLD OUT!) September 02 -- Hamburg, DE http://goo.gl/0XBPr (SOLD OUT!) September 03 -- Amsterdam, NL http://goo.gl/rTzT1 (SOLD OUT!) September 05 -- Paris, FR http://goo.gl/olCjB (SOLD OUT!) September 06 -- Bristol, UK http://goo.gl/PkYs8 (NEW VENUE!) September 07 -- Manchester, UK http://goo.gl/EJcZv (NEW VENUE!) September 08 -- London, UK http://goo.gl/NUv4c (SOLD OUT!) September 12 -- Sherbrooke, QC http://goo.gl/7DbSd September 13 -- Montreal, QC http://goo.gl/lVikj (SOLD OUT!) September 14 -- Montreal, QC http://goo.gl/AfU4N (SOLD OUT!) September 20 -- Toronto, ON http://goo.gl/uQhgf
MORE SHOWS TO BE ANNOUNCED SOON!
Please help us get back to the top of iTunes by downloading this single...thanks!
Walk off the Earth perform a cover of Gotye's "Somebody That I Used to Know" using five people on one guitar.
We would like to thank Gotye and Kimbra for writing such a beautiful song if you have not heard their music please go and check them out.
Please help us share this by posting it on your Facebook and Twitter. We will love you for eva and eva!
If you enjoyed this video then....
Hit the "Like" button Add it to your Favorites and of course subscribe to our channel if you haven't already!
Check out WOTE on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/walkofftheearth
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/walkofftheearth
Check out Sarah Blackwood on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/thesarahblackwood and YouTube : http://www.youtube.com/TheSarahBlackwood
Subscribe to Gianni and Sarah's blog/music Channel: http://www.youtube.com/gianniandsarahmusic
Special thanks to Guilly for helping us with this video.
Performers from left to right: Joel Cassady Sarah Blackwood Gianni Luminati Marshall Taylor
Extra Tags: Walk off the earth wote 2 guys 1 guitar 3 guys 1 guitar 4 guys 1 guitar 5 guys 1 guitar gianni luminati gianni nicassio sarah blackwood gianni and sarah marshall walk off the earth

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Guitar has been﻿ raped I feel bad for it
@blueeyesaf It is possible that they are trying to look as if﻿ they are in contemplation and not necessarily bored out of their skulls.
What﻿ a talent
Leonidis after he got kicked out of﻿ the 300
fucking﻿ awesome
GAYYYY﻿
I know how they can play together on﻿ one guitar...the guy on the very right is clearly chuck norris with a hat on :D
is﻿ this communist Billboard?
guy on the right,- "fuck, why do i always﻿ get the short stick"
i think they look﻿ this way on purpose.
I am studying recording arts in Audio engineering,﻿ so yes, I do know a thing or two about audio recording.

FLAWLESS.(: Hey!! You there, the one reading this comment at this very moment!! I love singing, and it's my dream to become a singer. Mind checking out my videos please? Just search 'singingdreamalways', and listen! Then you can like/dislike, comment, share, and subscribe!﻿ Thanks! :]
nice beard ﻿
I suppose it's possible. But look at the guy who sings first after the finish. He puts his﻿ elbow on the long haired guy's shoulder and just generally looks unhappy.
The man to the right is the serious man in﻿ the world
I don't like﻿ the song but this is bloody amazing
Why﻿ would anyone not like this video?
Macie Talent﻿ :p
i﻿ like his voice
Not Epic but Unique...﻿
Sarah is hot. She has﻿ some awesome tattoos.
whats﻿ the name of that woman?

The only thing I don't like about this video is they all look like they're bored out of their minds. It probably took a few takes to get this so it's certainly understandable but it takes some of the enjoyment of of something when the entertainer isn't having a good time as well. That mean said the﻿ singing is great and the fact they got so much music out of one guitar is amazing to me.
